name: Frightfully cute Jack-o-lantern Boutique Bow
description:
Gracie Bug Boutique has gone PUMPKINS  for Halloween! Your little Witch will adore this super bright and fun boutique bow! Perfect for the Fall and Halloween season! All Clips are made on fully finished alligator clips and all ends are heat sealed for a long lasting bow. 
If you have any questions or would like a different style of backing please convo me. Thank you for visiting Gracie Bug Boutique!

name: Flower Clips
description: Big, Bright, and Fun!!! These adorable Flower clips ad a bit of style to wherever you choose to stick them. Clip them to bags, shirts, hair, ...I even have used them as curtain tie backs! Your imagination is the only limit. All flowers are attached to fully covered alligator clips, so there are no edges to snag on fabric or pull hair, and finished in the center with a rhinestone. Available in Plum, Cream, Coral, Creamy Peach, and Pink. If you need another color just message me, I'm happy to create custom ones! Thanks for visiting Gracie Bug Boutique.
